title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the tangent line

1 point is earned for computes y on tangent line at x = 1.2

1 point is earned for the answer with reason

y=5( x−1 )−4 f( 1.2 )≈5( 0.2 )−4=−3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWG5b Gaeyypa0JaaGynamaabmaabaGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaaigdaaiaawIca caGLPaaacqGHsislcaaI0aaabaGaamOzamaabmaabaGaaGymaiaac6 cacaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyisISRaaGynamaabmaabaGaaGim aiaac6cacaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyOeI0IaaGinaiabg2da9i abgkHiTiaaiodaaaaa@4DB2@

The approximation is less than f(1.2) because the graph of f is concave up on the interval 1 < x < 1.2.
